description:
Creates an Asset Loader, which can handle the loading of load screen assets,
as well as the assets for the rest of the game.

params.name: game
params.description: The Phaser.Game to load assets to.

params.name: gamePacks
params.description: The AssetPacks that should be loaded for states after the loading screen.

params.name: loadscreenPack
params.description: The AssetPack to load the loading screen assets.

params.name: updateCallback
params.description: A callback to return the load progress and keyLookups.

    { vPos: "top", hPos: "left" },
    { vPos: "top", hPos: "right" },

    { vPos: "bottom", hPos: "right" },

    { vPos: "middle", hPos: "right" },
    { vPos: "bottom", hPos: "center" },
    { vPos: "middle", hPos: "center" },
    { vPos: "middle", hPos: "center", arrangeV: true },
];

content:
# Children's BBC - Genie

A modular framework to simplify the construction of children's games. 

## To build:

`npm run build` runs `webpack --config build-scripts/webpack.config.js`

`npm run build-watch` runs the compiler and creates a bundle. This means you can view index.html in a browser without having to run a webserver.

## To view:

`npm start` then navigate to http://localhost:8080/

Alternatively load http://localhost:8080/index.html as a file URL (requires `--allow-file-access-from-files` in Chrome.)

## To test:

`npm test` will run tests using karma. 

`npm run test-watch` will run tests using karma in watch mode.  

`npm run test:coverage` and `npm run test-watch:coverage` will calculate test coverage. This runs more **slowly** than running the tests normally.

## Auto documentation:

`npm run docs` opens the documentation.

`npm run autodocs` generates documentation using [ESDoc](https://esdoc.org/) and outputs to `docs/api/index.html`.

## QA Mode:

To access QA mode, add the `qaMode=true` query string to the URL: http://localhost:8080/?qaMode=true

This will output game loading progress and asset keylookups to the console. Pressing "q" will show the layout overlay, to show the game bounds.

## Documentation:
* [Genie Core Doucmentation][1]
* [Coding Guidelines][2]

[1]: docs/core.md
[2]: docs/coding-guidelines.md
name: ./README.md

content:
{
    "name": "genie",
    "version": "0.0.1",
    "description": "Genie Modular Game Engine",
    "license": "UNLICENSED",
    "private": true,
    "author": "BBC",
    "repository": {
        "type": "git",
        "url": "https://github.com/bbc/childrens-games-genie"
    },
    "dependencies": {
        "babel-polyfill": "^6.26.0",
        "lodash": "^4.17.4",
        "phaser-ce": "^2.10",
        "script-loader": "^0.7.2"
    },
    "devDependencies": {
        "babel-core": "^6.26.0",
        "babel-loader": "^7.1.2",
        "babel-preset-env": "^1.6.1",
        "chai": "^4.1.2",
        "cross-env": "^5.1.3",
        "esdoc": "1.0.4",
        "esdoc-standard-plugin": "1.0.0",
        "happypack": "^4.0.1",
        "http-server": "^0.11.1",
        "istanbul-instrumenter-loader": "^3.0.0",
        "karma": "^2.0.0",
        "karma-chai": "^0.1.0",
        "karma-chrome-launcher": "^2.2.0",
        "karma-coverage": "^1.1.1",
        "karma-mocha": "^1.3.0",
        "karma-mocha-reporter": "^2.2.5",
        "karma-remap-coverage": "^0.1.5",
        "karma-sinon": "^1.0.5",
        "karma-sourcemap-loader": "^0.3.7",
        "karma-webpack": "^2.0.9",
        "mocha": "^4.1.0",
        "npm": "^5.7.1",
        "requirejs": "^2.3.5",
        "sinon": "^4.1.5",
        "webpack": "^3.11.0"
    },
    "scripts": {
        "start": "http-server -c-1",
        "build": "webpack --config build-scripts/webpack.config.js",
        "build-watch": "webpack --config build-scripts/webpack.config.js --watch",
        "test": "karma start test/karma.conf.js",
        "test:coverage": "NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=4096 karma start test/karma.conf.js --coverage",
        "test-watch": "karma start test/karma.conf.js --no-single-run --auto-watch",
        "test-watch:coverage": "NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=4096 karma start test/karma.conf.js --no-single-run --auto-watch --coverage",
        "docs": "open ./docs/api/index.html",
        "autodocs": "./node_modules/.bin/esdoc"
    }
}
name: package.json
